titles.title: A resolution designating Jean M. Manning as Chief Counsel for Employment Emeritus of the United States Senate.
A resolution designating Jean M. Manning as Chief Counsel for Employment Emeritus of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates Jean M. Manning as Chief Counsel for Employment Emeritus of the United States Senate, as a token of the appreciation of the Senate for her long and faithful service. Makes such designation effective upon her retirement on March 19, 2014.
